text: kuda plastik kotas ekata ek karamin wiwidha...

“ayi sar puduma wela bala inne, sarta mawa andunaganda bari da?
math oya poth pradarshana balanta yanta eheka kiyala dawasak dekak niwadu gaththa hindath..
ee anuwa mema hamuwa pilibada shrilanipaye jyeshtayan janadhipathiwaraya samaga sakachja kirimata sudanamin sitina bawada danagannata atha.
ee wagema me loke eliya dakina da indan gewena hama thathparayakma wenwanne thamange aadaraniya daruwa wenuwen.
obalage premaya sima mayim nithirithi walin baduna ekakda ?
galu waraye nanguramla thibuna nawika hamudawata ayithi parakrama nawata hani siduwi thibuna kiyath dora ekakata ha motar jet ekak praharayen winasha wuna kiyala pasuwa dana gaththa.

swamin wahanse penwa denne "damila" yana wachanaya sankramanikaya yana arthaya dena bawath, warthamanaye "demala" yanuwen handinwena jana kottasaya handinwima sandaha bhawitha kala wachanayak nowana bawath ya.
anekwa esema walali giyeya.
pa්rabhakarange puth chals anthanige malasirura
oya aatha athithaye aadhyathmikawa diyunu kamashawa rahitha minisunge kathawa enne grika mithya kathawala.
kiwa yuthu hamadema bohoma sanwarawa kiyala thiyenawa.
‘‘gannawa’’ warthamana kala padayayi.
obe jiwithaye edineda karana samanya dewal athapasu nokaranna.
sha්ri lanka welawen pa.wa. 3.45ta pa්rasiddha karana lada twit paniwudayak magin milinda sandahan karanne ‘bas ratha dahas gananak thawa math ’kolambaata ‘paminemin thibena’ bawa yi.

anthima dawaswala pariganaka madi wuna.
"me inne durin neweyi" mama kimi.
me kisima kenekgen apita pudgalika wasi naha.
ese nam ema arayuma kara aththe merata sitina rajya nowana sanwidhana kriyakarinya.
ohu jiwithayata muhuna di gatha no haki wa beheth pethi bi diwi nasa gani.
awurudu bara ganakata passe, mama ara mallige wedin foto eka dakinawa...

pahugiya lipiyen tharawkara samagamak haraha kotas welanda palata piwisena kramayayi, kotas miladi ganima karanne mona widihatada kiyana ekayi pahadili kirimak sidda wuna nisa me para podi , nithara bhawitha wena wachana kipayak gana wisthara karannayi hithuwe.
lankapura pulasthigama siri parakum piriwene idikarana lada demahal bhikshu newasikagaraya saga sathu kota puja kirima janapathi pradhanathwayen
rathran yoda kala me nimawume ralu gorosu mathupita swabhawaya kridawata adala shakthiya saha balaya nirupanaya karana athara ehi athi thada shakthimath rekha kriyashili udyogaya op nanwayi.
thaththage aathma abhimanaya nisa api athare thawamath punchi badhakayak thiyenawa.
chandrikath eeka kiwuwa.
oyata ooni hamadema.
‘yuddha hamuda para krida ulela - 2017’ arambae.
meya loka prasiddha wenne nadda ??
ned idiriyata nambauruwemin asuwe ya.
me pituwa anthimata sakasuwe 12 sapthambar 2016 dina di, 17:13 welawehidiya.

patakaya ada bandaganna lesa prawruththi mawime hakiyawa aththe pradeshiya warthakaruwata yi.dinamina puwathpathe pradhana karthru gamini jayalath mahatha - “dinakara pathraye bandaragama warthakaru lesa eda kota kalisamak andagena rupiyal dekayi panahe, rupiyal pahe kaliwalata parawal gane awida madhya pannaraya labamin dinamina puwathpathe karthru dhuraya dakwa pamini gamana mata amathaka naha.
bola as kiyanne man neweyi.

ee nisa rahul aarohiwa kohoma hari muna gahenna hithagannawa.kohomi ් kohoma hari denna muna gahenawa wagema rahul aarohita porondu wenawa ayata me wage bar wala sindu kiyana eken nawaththala hoda gayikawak karanawa kiyala.aarohi mulin mohu gana wishwasayak thabanne na.
polime idala sinama shalawalawa pradarshanaya karanna awasthawak labenakota ehi ragapau nalu niliyan da wayasata gos chithrapataya kal ikuth wanu athi
danuth wenath thunwana lokaye ratakata wada api adhyapanayata pramukha thanak denawane.
eeka danan unne na...
kisikenekuta waradak wenna kiyala prarthana karanna neweyi.

mema wruththiya kriyamargaya ganimata mema sangam mita masayakata pamana pera thiranaya kale hinga watup laba nodima, usaswim kriyathmaka nokirima, jathika guru maru prathipaththiya kriyathmaka nokirima athulu illim sambandhayen adhyapana amathyanshaya kisidu prathicharayak nodakwima nisaya.
umbaata hena aathal ekak yannathi neda?
ithin ee thaththwaya wenas karanna elimahan prasangayakma karanna wenawa.
namak nathi maha kanda, oba...
ee aya prashna walata uththara didi inne karanna wena wada nathuwa nemeyi.
eeka hariyata mankolla kana eka wadiwunama fulfes helmat thahanam karanawa wage wadak.
ada madhyama rathriye sita kriyathmaka kirimata salasum kara thibu dumriya wadawarjanaya nathara kirimata thiranaya kara thikhenawa.
suba nawa wasarak wewa!
loku lokkange samahara daruwo ese wuwada sisun lesa pamina honda dewal karannoda naththema nowe .

awasana washayen gath wita, widhayaka janadhipathi kramaya ahosi kirima sandaha parlimenthuwe abhimathayata amatharawa mahajana anumathiyakuth awashya bawa kisiweku prathikshepa karanne nathi bawath kiwa yuthuya.
waidyawarayek thama sewawata mudal laba gaththa kiya ema sewawe agaya nathi nowe.
memangin apata malu aswanna ihala dama ganimata puluwan.ada kriyathmaka wena kramaya anuwa bahudina yathrawak wunath malu aswanna nela gath wita godabimata paminiya yuthu wenawa.
thawath ganika niwasa rupalawanyagara lesa pawathwagena gos atha.
wedikawata ekathu kara athi: sampurna anawum, welanda ithihasaya, antharkriyakari wagu, thakshanika wishleshanaya saha sahaya dakwana jangama upanga wala pulul thoraganima.

warthamana lokaye wiyathun saha chinthakayan pawa bauddha aagama walanda ganna pasubimak thula mewani ashobhana katayuthu siduwima magin anagathaye bihiwana bauddhayan udesa kebandu prathirupayak nirmanaya weda yanna pilibanda ithali baladharinge awadhanaya yomu wiya yuthuya.
eeyeth kol karala ahuwa..oyi pilima neluwata nam ithin mudalak athata labenawaya?
mahinda rajapaksha balaye siti kalaye da siduwuye waradikaruwanta erehiwa nithiya kriyathmaka nowu nisa janathawa nithiya athata gena katayuthu kirimaya.
eda ee pilibandawa behewin sakachcha wu namuth kisiyam apa no danna hethuwak nisa me karyaya eda itu wuye natha.
tharuna mawa udaraya alla gaththa..

sini mila sandaha palana milak

habayi aththa thaththwaya thamayi wisheshagnya waidyawarun bihi kirima sima kirima.
ithin mu kelinma sambandhayilu kafir yana anathurata.

aya "akal wassa" nam wedika natyaye ranganaya wenuwen "hondama wedika natya niliya" sammanaya laba thibuna."punchi baba" nam thamange aluth chithrapatayata nawaka niliyak soyamin siti thissa liyanasuriya nam chithrapata adhyakshawaraya wisi ek wiyathi me tharuniyata awasthawak dennata thiranayak gannawa.me thiranaye prathipalayak widihata parampara gananaka suwahasak ...

me rate adhikaranaye swadhinathwaya aaraksha kirima amathiwaraya hatiyata mage wagakimayi. 2015 janawari 8 wenida maithirapala sirisena mahathmaya me rata bharagannakota adhikaranaye swadhinathwaya athi kirime wagakima api hamotama bharadunna.

kuli minimaruwan, mankollakarayan, kappamkarayan, mathdrawya jawaramkaruwan, pimpiyan, dushanaya, wanchawa ha rawatima jiwana margaya kotagath pudgalayan ha ewani wyaparawala atharamadiyan ha tharawkarayan washayen ka්riyakarannange sankhyawe wegawath pa්rasaranayak me kalaya thula athiwiya.
halawatha pradeshaye padinchi ema kanthawa prasutha kara aththe pirim daruwekuyi.

dhanawadaya,samajawadaya neme koka wunath gedi pitin meheta kopi karanna baha ban.anith eka thiyena unta salli wisik wenne nikam neme ungen monawa hari balaporoththuwen.ekata dena santhoshama thamayi ee salli kuttiya.habayi duka ee salli kuttiya unta denne apen pikpokat gahala wima.

sathkamen pasu ahe efitiriyal kotasa wadimak siduwiya yuthu namuth eya mulin ese siduwune naha.anthimata waidya upades anuwa alwis mahathawa me sandaha singappuru jathika rohalata yawanu labanawa.me athara ee wana wita alwis mahathata sidu karana lada sathkamwala skan parikshanayak kara balanne ema sathkamwalin ho ahe patala ha adala kotaswala wadena bawak pennum karanawada soya balimataya.
atham rata wala janamatha wicharanaya pawathwana men aanduwen illa sitime ayithiya aandukrama wyawasthawa magin janathawata laba di atha .

ehidi wadiduratath adahas dakwu niyojya amathyawaraya ‘game thibena nidahas adhyapanaya gana metharam kata matha dodawana upadhidharin owunata game pasalakata pathwimak laba dunnama yanne naha.kawuruth balaporoththu wanne aananda, nalanda, wishakha ho nagaraye pasalak.

yayuthumaya mama nikma.......
naraka ma da wuye thun hawiridi wiye di siya bimath piya wisin atha patha ganu labu ayuru sihipath wima yi.

eeth tiken tika us mahath wela, danuma theruma athi kenek bawata path wenakota, ara punchi daruwa yauwanayeku bawata path wenakota aadaraya kiyana wachanaya ape jiwitha walin tiken tika aathata yanawa.
post eken kallak haluwa eke dawithta eetapasse wechch deth kiyalama dannam.
man eewa rakinna udaw karanawa witharayi...''

widyadaya alla ganna.
bolawu onema thaththa kenek balanne thamange puththaraya thamange thanata genna.
owuhu rata danithi.

wiwadha hithakara kshudrajiwin wanijamaya washayen nishpadanaya 2007 janawari masa sita aarambha karana lada athara ehidi diyara ha kudu aakarayen jaiwa palana kshudrajiwin (sudomonas florosin, trayikodarma wiride), jaiwa pohora ( asotobaktar saha rayisobiyam), wardhaka uththejaka saha kompost kirime hakiyawa athi jiwinda nipadawanu ladi.
